snippet: A $10 million study over three years will investigate whether a dietary supplement could help curb the number of suicides among service members, researchers said on Monday.
abstract: Ten million-dollar study over three years will investigate whether daily supplements of omega-3 fatty acids could help curb the number of suicides among military personnel and veterans.
lead_paragraph: A $10 million study over three years will investigate whether a dietary supplement could help curb the number of suicides among service members, researchers said on Monday.

headline.main: South Carolina: Military to Study Benefits of Fish Oil
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Military to Study Benefits of Fish Oil
